original_title: Ο Πρωτάρης Μπάτσος και η Τροτέζα
overview: Stathis Xetrypis, a naive policeman patrolling in an area frequented by prostitutes. As not yet enough, the commander, to confer the protection of Elsa, a secret policeman, trying to find a gang of drug dealers.
title: Ο Πρωτάρης Μπάτσος και η Τροτέζα
